00047 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS

00053 static inline void mdt_reint_init_ma(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00054                                      struct md_attr *ma)
00055 {
00056         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00057         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00058 }
00059 
00065 static void mdt_obj_version_get(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00066                                 struct mdt_object *o, __u64 *version)
00067 {
00068         LASSERT(o);
00069         if (mdt_object_exists(o) && !mdt_object_remote(o) &&
00070             !fid_is_obf(mdt_object_fid(o)))
00071                 *version = dt_version_get(info->mti_env, mdt_obj2dt(o));
00072         else
00073                 *version = ENOENT_VERSION;
00074         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "FID "DFID" version is "LPX64"\n",
00075                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), *version);
00076 }
00077 
00083 static int mdt_version_check(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00084                              __u64 version, int idx)
00085 {
00086         __u64 *pre_ver = lustre_msg_get_versions(req->rq_reqmsg);
00087         ENTRY;
00088 
00089         if (!exp_connect_vbr(req->rq_export))
00090                 RETURN(0);
00091 
00092         LASSERT(req_is_replay(req));
00094         LASSERT(idx < PTLRPC_NUM_VERSIONS);
00096         if (pre_ver == NULL) {
00097                 CERROR("No versions in request buffer\n");
00098                 spin_lock(&req->rq_export->exp_lock);
00099                 req->rq_export->exp_vbr_failed = 1;
00100                 spin_unlock(&req->rq_export->exp_lock);
00101                 RETURN(-EOVERFLOW);
00102         } else if (pre_ver[idx] != version) {
00103                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Version mismatch "LPX64" != "LPX64"\n",
00104                        pre_ver[idx], version);
00105                 spin_lock(&req->rq_export->exp_lock);
00106                 req->rq_export->exp_vbr_failed = 1;
00107                 spin_unlock(&req->rq_export->exp_lock);
00108                 RETURN(-EOVERFLOW);
00109         }
00110         RETURN(0);
00111 }
00112 
00116 static void mdt_version_save(struct ptlrpc_request *req, __u64 version,
00117                              int idx)
00118 {
00119         __u64 *reply_ver;
00120 
00121         if (!exp_connect_vbr(req->rq_export))
00122                 return;
00123 
00124         LASSERT(!req_is_replay(req));
00125         LASSERT(req->rq_repmsg != NULL);
00126         reply_ver = lustre_msg_get_versions(req->rq_repmsg);
00127         if (reply_ver)
00128                 reply_ver[idx] = version;
00129 }
00130 
00135 static void mdt_enoent_version_save(struct mdt_thread_info *info, int idx)
00136 {
00137         /* save version of file name for replay, it must be ENOENT here */
00138         if (!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info))) {
00139                 info->mti_ver[idx] = ENOENT_VERSION;
00140                 mdt_version_save(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[idx], idx);
00141         }
00142 }
00143 
00149 void mdt_version_get_save(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00150                           struct mdt_object *mto, int idx)
00151 {
00152         /* don't save versions during replay */
00153         if (!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info))) {
00154                 mdt_obj_version_get(info, mto, &info->mti_ver[idx]);
00155                 mdt_version_save(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[idx], idx);
00156         }
00157 }
00158 
00162 int mdt_version_get_check(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00163                           struct mdt_object *mto, int idx)
00164 {
00165         /* only check versions during replay */
00166         if (!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info)))
00167                 return 0;
00168 
00169         mdt_obj_version_get(info, mto, &info->mti_ver[idx]);
00170         return mdt_version_check(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[idx], idx);
00171 }
00172 
00176 int mdt_version_get_check_save(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00177                                struct mdt_object *mto, int idx)
00178 {
00179         int rc = 0;
00180 
00181         mdt_obj_version_get(info, mto, &info->mti_ver[idx]);
00182         if (req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info)))
00183                 rc = mdt_version_check(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[idx],
00184                                        idx);
00185         else
00186                 mdt_version_save(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[idx], idx);
00187         return rc;
00188 }
00189 
00196 static int mdt_lookup_version_check(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00197                                     struct mdt_object *p,
00198                                     const struct lu_name *lname,
00199                                     struct lu_fid *fid, int idx)
00200 {
00201         int rc, vbrc;
00202 
00203         rc = mdo_lookup(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(p), lname, fid,
00204                         &info->mti_spec);
00205         /* Check version only during replay */
00206         if (!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info)))
00207                 return rc;
00208 
00209         info->mti_ver[idx] = ENOENT_VERSION;
00210         if (rc == 0) {
00211                 struct mdt_object *child;
00212                 child = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, fid);
00213                 if (likely(!IS_ERR(child))) {
00214                         mdt_obj_version_get(info, child, &info->mti_ver[idx]);
00215                         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, child);
00216                 }
00217         }
00218         vbrc = mdt_version_check(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[idx], idx);
00219         return vbrc ? vbrc : rc;
00220 
00221 }
00222 
00223 static inline int mdt_remote_permission_check(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00224 {
00225         struct lu_ucred *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
00226         struct mdt_device *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00227 
00228         if (!md_capable(uc, CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN)) {
00229                 if (uc->uc_gid != mdt->mdt_enable_remote_dir_gid &&
00230                     mdt->mdt_enable_remote_dir_gid != -1)
00231                         return -EPERM;
00232         }
00233 
00234         return 0;
00235 }
00236 
00250 static int mdt_remote_permission(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00251 {
00252         struct md_op_spec *spec = &info->mti_spec;
00253         struct lu_attr *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
00254         struct obd_export *exp = mdt_info_req(info)->rq_export;
00255         int rc;
00256 
00257         if (info->mti_rr.rr_opcode == REINT_MIGRATE) {
00258                 rc = mdt_remote_permission_check(info);
00259                 if (rc != 0)
00260                         return rc;
00261         }
00262 
00263         if (info->mti_rr.rr_opcode == REINT_CREATE &&
00264             (S_ISDIR(attr->la_mode) && spec->u.sp_ea.eadata != NULL &&
00265              spec->u.sp_ea.eadatalen != 0)) {
00266                 const struct lmv_user_md *lum = spec->u.sp_ea.eadata;
00267 
00268                 /* Only new clients can create remote dir( >= 2.4) and
00269                  * striped dir(>= 2.6), old client will return -ENOTSUPP */
00270                 if (!mdt_is_dne_client(exp))
00271                         return -ENOTSUPP;
00272 
00273                 if (le32_to_cpu(lum->lum_stripe_count) > 1 &&
00274                     !mdt_is_striped_client(exp))
00275                         return -ENOTSUPP;
00276 
00277                 rc = mdt_remote_permission_check(info);
00278                 if (rc != 0)
00279                         return rc;
00280         }
00281 
00282         if (info->mti_rr.rr_opcode == REINT_SETATTR) {
00283                 struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00284 
00285                 if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV)) {
00286                         rc = mdt_remote_permission_check(info);
00287                         if (rc != 0)
00288                                 return rc;
00289                 }
00290         }
00291 
00292         return 0;
00293 }
00294 
00295 static int mdt_unlock_slaves(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00296                              struct mdt_object *obj, __u64 ibits,
00297                              struct mdt_lock_handle *s0_lh,
00298                              struct mdt_object *s0_obj,
00299                              struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo,
00300                              int decref)
00301 {
00302         union ldlm_policy_data *policy = &mti->mti_policy;
00303         struct lustre_handle_array *slave_locks = einfo->ei_cbdata;
00304         int i;
00305         int rc;
00306         ENTRY;
00307 
00308         if (!S_ISDIR(obj->mot_header.loh_attr))
00309                 RETURN(0);
00310 
00311         /* Unlock stripe 0 */
00312         if (s0_lh != NULL && lustre_handle_is_used(&s0_lh->mlh_reg_lh)) {
00313                 LASSERT(s0_obj != NULL);
00314                 mdt_object_unlock_put(mti, s0_obj, s0_lh, decref);
00315         }
00316 
00317         memset(policy, 0, sizeof(*policy));
00318         policy->l_inodebits.bits = ibits;
00319 
00320         if (slave_locks != NULL) {
00321                 LASSERT(s0_lh != NULL);
00322                 for (i = 1; i < slave_locks->count; i++) {
00323                         /* borrow s0_lh temporarily to do mdt unlock */
00324                         mdt_lock_reg_init(s0_lh, einfo->ei_mode);
00325                         s0_lh->mlh_rreg_lh = slave_locks->handles[i];
00326                         mdt_object_unlock(mti, obj, s0_lh, decref);
00327                         slave_locks->handles[i].cookie = 0ull;
00328                 }
00329         }
00330 
00331         rc = mo_object_unlock(mti->mti_env, mdt_object_child(obj), einfo,
00332                               policy);
00333         RETURN(rc);
00334 }
00335 
00336 static int mdt_init_slaves(struct mdt_thread_info *mti, struct mdt_object *obj,
00337                            struct lu_fid *fid)
00338 {
00339         struct lu_buf *buf = &mti->mti_buf;
00340         struct lmv_mds_md_v1 *lmv;
00341         int rc;
00342         ENTRY;
00343 
00344         if (!S_ISDIR(obj->mot_header.loh_attr))
00345                 RETURN(0);
00346 
00347         buf->lb_buf = mti->mti_xattr_buf;
00348         buf->lb_len = sizeof(mti->mti_xattr_buf);
00349         rc = mo_xattr_get(mti->mti_env, mdt_object_child(obj), buf,
00350                           XATTR_NAME_LMV);
00351         if (rc == -ERANGE) {
00352                 rc = mdt_big_xattr_get(mti, obj, XATTR_NAME_LMV);
00353                 if (rc > 0) {
00354                         buf->lb_buf = mti->mti_big_lmm;
00355                         buf->lb_len = mti->mti_big_lmmsize;
00356                 }
00357         }
00358 
00359         if (rc == -ENODATA || rc == -ENOENT)
00360                 RETURN(0);
00361 
00362         if (rc <= 0)
00363                 RETURN(rc);
00364 
00365         lmv = buf->lb_buf;
00366         if (le32_to_cpu(lmv->lmv_magic) != LMV_MAGIC_V1)
00367                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00368 
00369         fid_le_to_cpu(fid, &lmv->lmv_stripe_fids[0]);
00370 
00371         RETURN(rc);
00372 }
00373 
00378 static int mdt_lock_slaves(struct mdt_thread_info *mti, struct mdt_object *obj,
00379                            enum ldlm_mode mode, __u64 ibits,
00380                            struct lu_fid *s0_fid,
00381                            struct mdt_lock_handle *s0_lh,
00382                            struct mdt_object **s0_objp,
00383                            struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo)
00384 {
00385         union ldlm_policy_data *policy = &mti->mti_policy;
00386         int rc;
00387         ENTRY;
00388 
00389         rc = mdt_init_slaves(mti, obj, s0_fid);
00390         if (rc <= 0)
00391                 RETURN(rc);
00392 
00393         LASSERT(S_ISDIR(obj->mot_header.loh_attr));
00394 
00395         if (!lu_fid_eq(s0_fid, mdt_object_fid(obj))) {
00396                 /* Except migrating object, whose 0_stripe and master
00397                  * object are the same object, 0_stripe and master
00398                  * object are different, though they are in the same
00399                  * MDT, to avoid adding osd_object_lock here, so we
00400                  * will enqueue the stripe0 lock in MDT0 for now */
00401                 *s0_objp = mdt_object_find(mti->mti_env, mti->mti_mdt, s0_fid);
00402                 if (IS_ERR(*s0_objp))
00403                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(*s0_objp));
00404 
00405                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(mti, *s0_objp, s0_lh, ibits, true);
00406                 if (rc < 0) {
00407                         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, *s0_objp);
00408                         RETURN(rc);
00409                 }
00410         }
00411 
00412         memset(einfo, 0, sizeof(*einfo));
00413         einfo->ei_type = LDLM_IBITS;
00414         einfo->ei_mode = mode;
00415         einfo->ei_cb_bl = mdt_remote_blocking_ast;
00416         einfo->ei_cb_local_bl = mdt_blocking_ast;
00417         einfo->ei_cb_cp = ldlm_completion_ast;
00418         einfo->ei_enq_slave = 1;
00419         einfo->ei_namespace = mti->mti_mdt->mdt_namespace;
00420         memset(policy, 0, sizeof(*policy));
00421         policy->l_inodebits.bits = ibits;
00422 
00423         rc = mo_object_lock(mti->mti_env, mdt_object_child(obj), NULL, einfo,
00424                             policy);
00425         RETURN(rc);
00426 }
00427 
00428 /*
00429  * VBR: we save three versions in reply:
00430  * 0 - parent. Check that parent version is the same during replay.
00431  * 1 - name. Version of 'name' if file exists with the same name or
00432  * ENOENT_VERSION, it is needed because file may appear due to missed replays.
00433  * 2 - child. Version of child by FID. Must be ENOENT. It is mostly sanity
00434  * check.
00435  */
00436 static int mdt_md_create(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00437 {
00438         struct mdt_device       *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00439         struct mdt_object       *parent;
00440         struct mdt_object       *child;
00441         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
00442         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00443         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00444         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
00445         int rc;
00446         ENTRY;
00447 
00448         DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, mdt_info_req(info), "Create  ("DNAME"->"DFID") "
00449                   "in "DFID,
00450                   PNAME(&rr->rr_name), PFID(rr->rr_fid2), PFID(rr->rr_fid1));
00451 
00452         if (!fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid1))
00453                 RETURN(-EPERM);
00454 
00455         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00456 
00457         parent = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
00458         if (IS_ERR(parent))
00459                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(parent));
00460 
00461         if (!mdt_object_exists(parent))
00462                 GOTO(put_parent, rc = -ENOENT);
00463 
00464         lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
00465         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lh, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_name);
00466         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, parent, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00467         if (rc)
00468                 GOTO(put_parent, rc);
00469 
00470         if (!mdt_object_remote(parent)) {
00471                 rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, parent, 0);
00472                 if (rc)
00473                         GOTO(unlock_parent, rc);
00474         }
00475 
00476         /*
00477          * Check child name version during replay.
00478          * During create replay a file may exist with same name.
00479          */
00480         rc = mdt_lookup_version_check(info, parent, &rr->rr_name,
00481                                       &info->mti_tmp_fid1, 1);
00482         if (rc == 0)
00483                 GOTO(unlock_parent, rc = -EEXIST);
00484 
00485         /* -ENOENT is expected here */
00486         if (rc != -ENOENT)
00487                 GOTO(unlock_parent, rc);
00488 
00489         /* save version of file name for replay, it must be ENOENT here */
00490         mdt_enoent_version_save(info, 1);
00491 
00492         child = mdt_object_new(info->mti_env, mdt, rr->rr_fid2);
00493         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(child)))
00494                 GOTO(unlock_parent, rc = PTR_ERR(child));
00495 
00496         rc = mdt_remote_permission(info);
00497         if (rc != 0)
00498                 GOTO(put_child, rc);
00499 
00500         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00501         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00502 
00503         mdt_fail_write(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
00504                         OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_CREATE_WRITE);
00505 
00506         /* Version of child will be updated on disk. */
00507         tgt_vbr_obj_set(info->mti_env, mdt_obj2dt(child));
00508         rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, child, 2);
00509         if (rc)
00510                 GOTO(put_child, rc);
00511 
00512         /* Let lower layer know current lock mode. */
00513         info->mti_spec.sp_cr_mode = mdt_dlm_mode2mdl_mode(lh->mlh_pdo_mode);
00514 
00515         /*
00516          * Do not perform lookup sanity check. We know that name does
00517          * not exist.
00518          */
00519         info->mti_spec.sp_cr_lookup = 0;
00520         info->mti_spec.sp_feat = &dt_directory_features;
00521 
00522         rc = mdo_create(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(parent), &rr->rr_name,
00523                         mdt_object_child(child), &info->mti_spec, ma);
00524         if (rc == 0)
00525                 rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, child, ma);
00526 
00527         if (rc < 0)
00528                 GOTO(put_child, rc);
00529 
00530         /*
00531          * On DNE, we need to eliminate dependey between 'mkdir a' and
00532          * 'mkdir a/b' if b is a striped directory, to achieve this, two
00533          * things are done below:
00534          * 1. save child and slaves lock.
00535          * 2. if the child is a striped directory, relock parent so to
00536          *    compare against with COS locks to ensure parent was
00537          *    committed to disk.
00538          */
00539         if (mdt_slc_is_enabled(mdt) && S_ISDIR(ma->ma_attr.la_mode)) {
00540                 struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc;
00541                 struct mdt_lock_handle *s0_lh;
00542                 struct mdt_object *s0_obj = NULL;
00543                 struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo;
00544                 struct lu_fid *s0_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
00545                 bool cos_incompat = false;
00546 
00547                 rc = mdt_init_slaves(info, child, s0_fid);
00548                 if (rc > 0) {
00549                         cos_incompat = true;
00550                         if (!mdt_object_remote(parent)) {
00551                                 mdt_object_unlock(info, parent, lh, 1);
00552                                 mdt_lock_pdo_init(lh, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_name);
00553                                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, parent, lh,
00554                                                            MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
00555                                                            true);
00556                                 if (rc)
00557                                         GOTO(put_child, rc);
00558                         }
00559                 }
00560 
00561                 einfo = &info->mti_einfo;
00562                 lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
00563                 mdt_lock_handle_init(lhc);
00564                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lhc, LCK_PW);
00565                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, child, lhc,
00566                                            MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
00567                                            cos_incompat);
00568                 if (rc)
00569                         GOTO(put_child, rc);
00570                 mdt_object_unlock(info, child, lhc, rc);
00571 
00572                 s0_lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LOCAL];
00573                 mdt_lock_handle_init(s0_lh);
00574                 mdt_lock_reg_init(s0_lh, LCK_PW);
00575                 rc = mdt_lock_slaves(info, child, LCK_PW, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
00576                                      s0_fid, s0_lh, &s0_obj, einfo);
00577                 mdt_unlock_slaves(info, child, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, s0_lh,
00578                                   s0_obj, einfo, rc);
00579                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_BAD_SLAVE_NAME) && rc == -EIO)
00580                         rc = 0;
00581         }
00582 
00583         /* Return fid & attr to client. */
00584         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE)
00585                 mdt_pack_attr2body(info, repbody, &ma->ma_attr,
00586                                    mdt_object_fid(child));
00587 put_child:
00588         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, child);
00589 unlock_parent:
00590         mdt_object_unlock(info, parent, lh, rc);
00591 put_parent:
00592         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, parent);
00593         RETURN(rc);
00594 }
00595 
00596 static int mdt_attr_set(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *mo,
00597                         struct md_attr *ma)
00598 {
00599         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
00600         int do_vbr = ma->ma_attr.la_valid & (LA_MODE|LA_UID|LA_GID|LA_FLAGS);
00601         __u64 lockpart = MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
00602         struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo = &info->mti_einfo;
00603         struct lu_fid *s0_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
00604         struct mdt_lock_handle *s0_lh = NULL;
00605         struct mdt_object *s0_obj = NULL;
00606         bool cos_incompat = false;
00607         int rc;
00608         ENTRY;
00609 
00610         rc = mdt_init_slaves(info, mo, s0_fid);
00611         if (rc > 0)
00612                 cos_incompat = true;
00613 
00614         lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
00615         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_PW);
00616 
00617         /* Even though the new MDT will grant PERM lock to the old
00618          * client, but the old client will almost ignore that during
00619          * So it needs to revoke both LOOKUP and PERM lock here, so
00620          * both new and old client can cancel the dcache */
00621         if (ma->ma_attr.la_valid & (LA_MODE|LA_UID|LA_GID))
00622                 lockpart |= MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_PERM;
00623 
00624         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mo, lh, lockpart, cos_incompat);
00625         if (rc != 0)
00626                 RETURN(rc);
00627 
00628         s0_lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LOCAL];
00629         mdt_lock_reg_init(s0_lh, LCK_PW);
00630         rc = mdt_lock_slaves(info, mo, LCK_PW, lockpart, s0_fid, s0_lh, &s0_obj,
00631                              einfo);
00632         if (rc != 0)
00633                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00634 
00635         /* all attrs are packed into mti_attr in unpack_setattr */
00636         mdt_fail_write(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
00637                        OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_SETATTR_WRITE);
00638 
00639         /* This is only for set ctime when rename's source is on remote MDS. */
00640         if (unlikely(ma->ma_attr.la_valid == LA_CTIME))
00641                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_VTX_BYPASS;
00642 
00643         /* VBR: update version if attr changed are important for recovery */
00644         if (do_vbr) {
00645                 /* update on-disk version of changed object */
00646                 tgt_vbr_obj_set(info->mti_env, mdt_obj2dt(mo));
00647                 rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, mo, 0);
00648                 if (rc)
00649                         GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00650         }
00651 
00652         /* Ensure constant striping during chown(). See LU-2789. */
00653         if (ma->ma_attr.la_valid & (LA_UID|LA_GID))
00654                 mutex_lock(&mo->mot_lov_mutex);
00655 
00656         /* all attrs are packed into mti_attr in unpack_setattr */
00657         rc = mo_attr_set(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(mo), ma);
00658 
00659         if (ma->ma_attr.la_valid & (LA_UID|LA_GID))
00660                 mutex_unlock(&mo->mot_lov_mutex);
00661 
00662         if (rc != 0)
00663                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00664 
00665         EXIT;
00666 out_unlock:
00667         mdt_unlock_slaves(info, mo, lockpart, s0_lh, s0_obj, einfo, rc);
00668         mdt_object_unlock(info, mo, lh, rc);
00669         return rc;
00670 }
00671 
00678 int mdt_add_dirty_flag(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *mo,
00679                         struct md_attr *ma)
00680 {
00681         int rc;
00682         ENTRY;
00683 
00684         /* If the file was modified, add the dirty flag */
00685         ma->ma_need = MA_HSM;
00686         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, mo, ma);
00687         if (rc) {
00688                 CERROR("file attribute read error for "DFID": %d.\n",
00689                         PFID(mdt_object_fid(mo)), rc);
00690                 RETURN(rc);
00691         }
00692 
00693         /* If an up2date copy exists in the backend, add dirty flag */
00694         if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_HSM) && (ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & HS_EXISTS)
00695             && !(ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & (HS_DIRTY|HS_RELEASED))) {
00696                 struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
00697 
00698                 ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags |= HS_DIRTY;
00699 
00700                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_PW);
00701                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, mo, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
00702                 if (rc != 0)
00703                         RETURN(rc);
00704 
00705                 rc = mdt_hsm_attr_set(info, mo, &ma->ma_hsm);
00706                 if (rc)
00707                         CERROR("file attribute change error for "DFID": %d\n",
00708                                 PFID(mdt_object_fid(mo)), rc);
00709                 mdt_object_unlock(info, mo, lh, rc);
00710         }
00711 
00712         RETURN(rc);
00713 }
00714 
00715 static int mdt_reint_setattr(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00716                              struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00717 {
00718         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00719         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
00720         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00721         struct mdt_object       *mo;
00722         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00723         int                      rc, rc2;
00724         ENTRY;
00725 
00726         DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, req, "setattr "DFID" %x", PFID(rr->rr_fid1),
00727                   (unsigned int)ma->ma_attr.la_valid);
00728 
00729         if (info->mti_dlm_req)
00730                 ldlm_request_cancel(req, info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
00731 
00732         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00733         mo = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
00734         if (IS_ERR(mo))
00735                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(mo));
00736 
00737         if (!mdt_object_exists(mo))
00738                 GOTO(out_put, rc = -ENOENT);
00739 
00740         if (mdt_object_remote(mo))
00741                 GOTO(out_put, rc = -EREMOTE);
00742 
00743         if ((ma->ma_attr.la_valid & LA_SIZE) ||
00744             (rr->rr_flags & MRF_OPEN_TRUNC)) {
00745                 /* Check write access for the O_TRUNC case */
00746                 if (mdt_write_read(mo) < 0)
00747                         GOTO(out_put, rc = -ETXTBSY);
00748         }
00749 
00750         if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE) && ma->ma_attr.la_valid) {
00751                 if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV)
00752                         GOTO(out_put, rc = -EPROTO);
00753 
00754                 rc = mdt_attr_set(info, mo, ma);
00755                 if (rc)
00756                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00757         } else if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) && (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE)) {
00758                 struct lu_buf *buf  = &info->mti_buf;
00759 
00760                 if (ma->ma_attr.la_valid != 0)
00761                         GOTO(out_put, rc = -EPROTO);
00762 
00763                 buf->lb_buf = ma->ma_lmm;
00764                 buf->lb_len = ma->ma_lmm_size;
00765                 rc = mo_xattr_set(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(mo),
00766                                   buf, XATTR_NAME_LOV, 0);
00767                 if (rc)
00768                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00769         } else if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV) && (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE)) {
00770                 struct lu_buf *buf  = &info->mti_buf;
00771                 struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
00772 
00773                 rc = mdt_remote_permission(info);
00774                 if (rc < 0)
00775                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00776 
00777                 if (ma->ma_attr.la_valid != 0)
00778                         GOTO(out_put, rc = -EPROTO);
00779 
00780                 lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
00781                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_PW);
00782 
00783                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, mo, lh,
00784                                      MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
00785                 if (rc != 0)
00786                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00787 
00788                 buf->lb_buf = ma->ma_lmv;
00789                 buf->lb_len = ma->ma_lmv_size;
00790                 rc = mo_xattr_set(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(mo),
00791                                   buf, XATTR_NAME_DEFAULT_LMV, 0);
00792 
00793                 mdt_object_unlock(info, mo, lh, rc);
00794                 if (rc)
00795                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00796         } else {
00797                 GOTO(out_put, rc = -EPROTO);
00798         }
00799 
00800         /* If file data is modified, add the dirty flag */
00801         if (ma->ma_attr_flags & MDS_DATA_MODIFIED)
00802                 rc = mdt_add_dirty_flag(info, mo, ma);
00803 
00804         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00805         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00806         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, mo, ma);
00807         if (rc != 0)
00808                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
00809 
00810         mdt_pack_attr2body(info, repbody, &ma->ma_attr, mdt_object_fid(mo));
00811 
00812         EXIT;
00813 out_put:
00814         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mo);
00815 out:
00816         if (rc == 0)
00817                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_SETATTR);
00818 
00819         mdt_client_compatibility(info);
00820         rc2 = mdt_fix_reply(info);
00821         if (rc == 0)
00822                 rc = rc2;
00823         return rc;
00824 }
00825 
00826 static int mdt_reint_create(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00827                             struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00828 {
00829         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00830         int                     rc;
00831         ENTRY;
00832 
00833         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_CREATE))
00834                 RETURN(err_serious(-ESTALE));
00835 
00836         if (info->mti_dlm_req)
00837                 ldlm_request_cancel(mdt_info_req(info),
00838                                     info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
00839 
00840         if (!lu_name_is_valid(&info->mti_rr.rr_name))
00841                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00842 
00843         switch (info->mti_attr.ma_attr.la_mode & S_IFMT) {
00844         case S_IFDIR:
00845                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_MKDIR);
00846                 break;
00847         case S_IFREG:
00848         case S_IFLNK:
00849         case S_IFCHR:
00850         case S_IFBLK:
00851         case S_IFIFO:
00852         case S_IFSOCK:
00853                 /* Special file should stay on the same node as parent. */
00854                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_MKNOD);
00855                 break;
00856         default:
00857                 CERROR("%s: Unsupported mode %o\n",
00858                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00859                        info->mti_attr.ma_attr.la_mode);
00860                 RETURN(err_serious(-EOPNOTSUPP));
00861         }
00862 
00863         rc = mdt_md_create(info);
00864         RETURN(rc);
00865 }
00866 
00867 /*
00868  * VBR: save parent version in reply and child version getting by its name.
00869  * Version of child is getting and checking during its lookup. If
00870  */
00871 static int mdt_reint_unlink(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00872                             struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00873 {
00874         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
00875         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00876         struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00877         struct lu_fid *child_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
00878         struct mdt_object *mp;
00879         struct mdt_object *mc;
00880         struct mdt_lock_handle *parent_lh;
00881         struct mdt_lock_handle *child_lh;
00882         struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo = &info->mti_einfo;
00883         struct lu_fid *s0_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid2;
00884         struct mdt_lock_handle *s0_lh = NULL;
00885         struct mdt_object *s0_obj = NULL;
00886         __u64 lock_ibits;
00887         bool cos_incompat = false;
00888         int no_name = 0;
00889         int rc;
00890         ENTRY;
00891 
00892         DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, req, "unlink "DFID"/"DNAME"", PFID(rr->rr_fid1),
00893                   PNAME(&rr->rr_name));
00894 
00895         if (info->mti_dlm_req)
00896                 ldlm_request_cancel(req, info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
00897 
00898         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_UNLINK))
00899                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOENT));
00900 
00901         if (!fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid1))
00902                 RETURN(-EPERM);
00903 
00904         mp = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
00905         if (IS_ERR(mp))
00906                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(mp));
00907 
00908         if (!mdt_object_remote(mp)) {
00909                 rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, mp, 0);
00910                 if (rc)
00911                         GOTO(put_parent, rc);
00912         }
00913 
00914         /* lookup child object along with version checking */
00915         fid_zero(child_fid);
00916         rc = mdt_lookup_version_check(info, mp, &rr->rr_name, child_fid, 1);
00917         if (rc != 0) {
00918                 /* Name might not be able to find during resend of
00919                  * remote unlink, considering following case.
00920                  * dir_A is a remote directory, the name entry of
00921                  * dir_A is on MDT0, the directory is on MDT1,
00922                  *
00923                  * 1. client sends unlink req to MDT1.
00924                  * 2. MDT1 sends name delete update to MDT0.
00925                  * 3. name entry is being deleted in MDT0 synchronously.
00926                  * 4. MDT1 is restarted.
00927                  * 5. client resends unlink req to MDT1. So it can not
00928                  *    find the name entry on MDT0 anymore.
00929                  * In this case, MDT1 only needs to destory the local
00930                  * directory.
00931                  * */
00932                 if (mdt_object_remote(mp) && rc == -ENOENT &&
00933                     !fid_is_zero(rr->rr_fid2) &&
00934                     lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT) {
00935                         no_name = 1;
00936                         *child_fid = *rr->rr_fid2;
00937                  } else {
00938                         GOTO(put_parent, rc);
00939                  }
00940         }
00941 
00942         if (!fid_is_md_operative(child_fid))
00943                 GOTO(put_parent, rc = -EPERM);
00944 
00945         /* We will lock the child regardless it is local or remote. No harm. */
00946         mc = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, child_fid);
00947         if (IS_ERR(mc))
00948                 GOTO(put_parent, rc = PTR_ERR(mc));
00949 
00950         rc = mdt_init_slaves(info, mc, s0_fid);
00951         cos_incompat = (mdt_object_remote(mp) || (rc > 0));
00952 
00953         parent_lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
00954         mdt_lock_pdo_init(parent_lh, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_name);
00955         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mp, parent_lh, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
00956                                    cos_incompat);
00957         if (rc != 0)
00958                 GOTO(put_child, rc);
00959 
00960         child_lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
00961         mdt_lock_reg_init(child_lh, LCK_EX);
00962         if (info->mti_spec.sp_rm_entry) {
00963                 struct lu_ucred *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
00964 
00965                 if (!mdt_is_dne_client(req->rq_export))
00966                         /* Return -ENOTSUPP for old client */
00967                         GOTO(unlock_parent, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
00968 
00969                 if (!md_capable(uc, CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN))
00970                         GOTO(unlock_parent, rc = -EPERM);
00971 
00972                 ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00973                 ma->ma_valid = 0;
00974                 rc = mdo_unlink(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(mp),
00975                                 NULL, &rr->rr_name, ma, no_name);
00976                 GOTO(unlock_parent, rc);
00977         }
00978 
00979         if (mdt_object_remote(mc)) {
00980                 struct mdt_body  *repbody;
00981 
00982                 if (!fid_is_zero(rr->rr_fid2)) {
00983                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: name "DNAME" cannot find "DFID"\n",
00984                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00985                                PNAME(&rr->rr_name), PFID(mdt_object_fid(mc)));
00986                         GOTO(unlock_parent, rc = -ENOENT);
00987                 }
00988                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: name "DNAME": "DFID" is on another MDT\n",
00989                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00990                        PNAME(&rr->rr_name), PFID(mdt_object_fid(mc)));
00991 
00992                 if (!mdt_is_dne_client(req->rq_export))
00993                         /* Return -ENOTSUPP for old client */
00994                         GOTO(unlock_parent, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
00995 
00996                 /* Revoke the LOOKUP lock of the remote object granted by
00997                  * this MDT. Since the unlink will happen on another MDT,
00998                  * it will release the LOOKUP lock right away. Then What
00999                  * would happen if another client try to grab the LOOKUP
01000                  * lock at the same time with unlink XXX */
01001                 mdt_object_lock(info, mc, child_lh, MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP);
01002                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01003                 LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
01004                 repbody->mbo_fid1 = *mdt_object_fid(mc);
01005                 repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_MDS);
01006                 GOTO(unlock_child, rc = -EREMOTE);
01007         }
01008         /* We used to acquire MDS_INODELOCK_FULL here but we can't do
01009          * this now because a running HSM restore on the child (unlink
01010          * victim) will hold the layout lock. See LU-4002. */
01011         lock_ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
01012         if (mdt_object_remote(mp)) {
01013                 /* Enqueue lookup lock from parent MDT */
01014                 rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, mp, mdt_object_fid(mc),
01015                                             &child_lh->mlh_rreg_lh,
01016                                             child_lh->mlh_rreg_mode,
01017                                             MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP, false);
01018                 if (rc != ELDLM_OK)
01019                         GOTO(unlock_parent, rc);
01020 
01021                 lock_ibits &= ~MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
01022         }
01023 
01024         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mc, child_lh, lock_ibits,
01025                                    cos_incompat);
01026         if (rc != 0)
01027                 GOTO(unlock_child, rc);
01028 
01029         /*
01030          * Now we can only make sure we need MA_INODE, in mdd layer, will check
01031          * whether need MA_LOV and MA_COOKIE.
01032          */
01033         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
01034         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01035 
01036         s0_lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LOCAL];
01037         mdt_lock_reg_init(s0_lh, LCK_EX);
01038         rc = mdt_lock_slaves(info, mc, LCK_EX, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, s0_fid,
01039                              s0_lh, &s0_obj, einfo);
01040         if (rc != 0)
01041                 GOTO(unlock_child, rc);
01042 
01043         mdt_fail_write(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
01044                        OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_UNLINK_WRITE);
01045         /* save version when object is locked */
01046         mdt_version_get_save(info, mc, 1);
01047 
01048         mutex_lock(&mc->mot_lov_mutex);
01049 
01050         rc = mdo_unlink(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(mp),
01051                         mdt_object_child(mc), &rr->rr_name, ma, no_name);
01052 
01053         mutex_unlock(&mc->mot_lov_mutex);
01054 
01055         if (rc == 0 && !lu_object_is_dying(&mc->mot_header))
01056                 rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, mc, ma);
01057         if (rc == 0)
01058                 mdt_handle_last_unlink(info, mc, ma);
01059 
01060         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE) {
01061                 switch (ma->ma_attr.la_mode & S_IFMT) {
01062                 case S_IFDIR:
01063                         mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_RMDIR);
01064                         break;
01065                 case S_IFREG:
01066                 case S_IFLNK:
01067                 case S_IFCHR:
01068                 case S_IFBLK:
01069                 case S_IFIFO:
01070                 case S_IFSOCK:
01071                         mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_UNLINK);
01072                         break;
01073                 default:
01074                         LASSERTF(0, "bad file type %o unlinking\n",
01075                                  ma->ma_attr.la_mode);
01076                 }
01077         }
01078 
01079         EXIT;
01080 
01081 unlock_child:
01082         mdt_unlock_slaves(info, mc, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, s0_lh, s0_obj, einfo,
01083                           rc);
01084         mdt_object_unlock(info, mc, child_lh, rc);
01085 unlock_parent:
01086         mdt_object_unlock(info, mp, parent_lh, rc);
01087 put_child:
01088         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mc);
01089 put_parent:
01090         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mp);
01091         return rc;
01092 }
01093 
01094 /*
01095  * VBR: save versions in reply: 0 - parent; 1 - child by fid; 2 - target by
01096  * name.
01097  */
01098 static int mdt_reint_link(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01099                           struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
01100 {
01101         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01102         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
01103         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01104         struct mdt_object       *ms;
01105         struct mdt_object       *mp;
01106         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lhs;
01107         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lhp;
01108         bool cos_incompat;
01109         int rc;
01110         ENTRY;
01111 
01112         DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, req, "link "DFID" to "DFID"/"DNAME,
01113                   PFID(rr->rr_fid1), PFID(rr->rr_fid2), PNAME(&rr->rr_name));
01114 
01115         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_LINK))
01116                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOENT));
01117 
01118         if (info->mti_dlm_req)
01119                 ldlm_request_cancel(req, info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
01120 
01121         /* Invalid case so return error immediately instead of
01122          * processing it */
01123         if (lu_fid_eq(rr->rr_fid1, rr->rr_fid2))
01124                 RETURN(-EPERM);
01125 
01126         if (!fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid1) ||
01127             !fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid2))
01128                 RETURN(-EPERM);
01129 
01130         /* step 1: find target parent dir */
01131         mp = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid2);
01132         if (IS_ERR(mp))
01133                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(mp));
01134 
01135         rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, mp, 0);
01136         if (rc)
01137                 GOTO(put_parent, rc);
01138 
01139         /* step 2: find source */
01140         ms = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
01141         if (IS_ERR(ms))
01142                 GOTO(put_parent, rc = PTR_ERR(ms));
01143 
01144         if (!mdt_object_exists(ms)) {
01145                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: "DFID" does not exist.\n",
01146                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(rr->rr_fid1));
01147                 GOTO(put_source, rc = -ENOENT);
01148         }
01149 
01150         cos_incompat = (mdt_object_remote(mp) || mdt_object_remote(ms));
01151 
01152         lhp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
01153         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lhp, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_name);
01154         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mp, lhp, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
01155                                    cos_incompat);
01156         if (rc != 0)
01157                 GOTO(put_source, rc);
01158 
01159         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME3, 5);
01160 
01161         lhs = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
01162         mdt_lock_reg_init(lhs, LCK_EX);
01163         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, ms, lhs,
01164                                    MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE | MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR,
01165                                    cos_incompat);
01166         if (rc != 0)
01167                 GOTO(unlock_parent, rc);
01168 
01169         /* step 3: link it */
01170         mdt_fail_write(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
01171                         OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_LINK_WRITE);
01172 
01173         tgt_vbr_obj_set(info->mti_env, mdt_obj2dt(ms));
01174         rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, ms, 1);
01175         if (rc)
01176                 GOTO(unlock_source, rc);
01177 
01179         rc = mdt_lookup_version_check(info, mp, &rr->rr_name,
01180                                       &info->mti_tmp_fid1, 2);
01181         if (rc != 0 && rc != -ENOENT)
01182                 GOTO(unlock_source, rc);
01183         /* save version of file name for replay, it must be ENOENT here */
01184         if (!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info))) {
01185                 if (rc != -ENOENT) {
01186                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "link target "DNAME" existed!\n",
01187                                PNAME(&rr->rr_name));
01188                         GOTO(unlock_source, rc = -EEXIST);
01189                 }
01190                 info->mti_ver[2] = ENOENT_VERSION;
01191                 mdt_version_save(mdt_info_req(info), info->mti_ver[2], 2);
01192         }
01193 
01194         rc = mdo_link(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(mp),
01195                       mdt_object_child(ms), &rr->rr_name, ma);
01196 
01197         if (rc == 0)
01198                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_LINK);
01199 
01200         EXIT;
01201 unlock_source:
01202         mdt_object_unlock(info, ms, lhs, rc);
01203 unlock_parent:
01204         mdt_object_unlock(info, mp, lhp, rc);
01205 put_source:
01206         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, ms);
01207 put_parent:
01208         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mp);
01209         return rc;
01210 }
01215 static int mdt_pdir_hash_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01216                               struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
01217                               struct mdt_object *obj, __u64 ibits,
01218                               bool cos_incompat)
01219 {
01220         struct ldlm_res_id *res = &info->mti_res_id;
01221         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = info->mti_mdt->mdt_namespace;
01222         union ldlm_policy_data *policy = &info->mti_policy;
01223         __u64 dlmflags = LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY | LDLM_FL_ATOMIC_CB;
01224         int rc;
01225 
01226         /*
01227          * Finish res_id initializing by name hash marking part of
01228          * directory which is taking modification.
01229          */
01230         LASSERT(lh->mlh_pdo_hash != 0);
01231         fid_build_pdo_res_name(mdt_object_fid(obj), lh->mlh_pdo_hash, res);
01232         memset(policy, 0, sizeof(*policy));
01233         policy->l_inodebits.bits = ibits;
01234         if (cos_incompat &&
01235             (lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_PW || lh->mlh_reg_mode == LCK_EX))
01236                 dlmflags |= LDLM_FL_COS_INCOMPAT;
01237         /*
01238          * Use LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY for this lock. We do not know yet if it is
01239          * going to be sent to client. If it is - mdt_intent_policy() path will
01240          * fix it up and turn FL_LOCAL flag off.
01241          */
01242         rc = mdt_fid_lock(ns, &lh->mlh_reg_lh, lh->mlh_reg_mode, policy,
01243                           res, dlmflags, &info->mti_exp->exp_handle.h_cookie);
01244         return rc;
01245 }
01246 
01250 static int mdt_rename_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01251                            struct lustre_handle *lh)
01252 {
01253         int     rc;
01254         ENTRY;
01255 
01256         if (mdt_seq_site(info->mti_mdt)->ss_node_id != 0) {
01257                 struct lu_fid *fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01258                 struct mdt_object *obj;
01259 
01260                 /* XXX, right now, it has to use object API to
01261                  * enqueue lock cross MDT, so it will enqueue
01262                  * rename lock(with LUSTRE_BFL_FID) by root object */
01263                 lu_root_fid(fid);
01264                 obj = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, fid);
01265                 if (IS_ERR(obj))
01266                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(obj));
01267 
01268                 rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, obj,
01269                                             &LUSTRE_BFL_FID, lh,
01270                                             LCK_EX,
01271                                             MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, false);
01272                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, obj);
01273         } else {
01274                 struct ldlm_namespace *ns = info->mti_mdt->mdt_namespace;
01275                 union ldlm_policy_data *policy = &info->mti_policy;
01276                 struct ldlm_res_id *res_id = &info->mti_res_id;
01277                 __u64 flags = 0;
01278 
01279                 fid_build_reg_res_name(&LUSTRE_BFL_FID, res_id);
01280                 memset(policy, 0, sizeof *policy);
01281                 policy->l_inodebits.bits = MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
01282                 flags = LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY | LDLM_FL_ATOMIC_CB;
01283                 rc = ldlm_cli_enqueue_local(ns, res_id, LDLM_IBITS, policy,
01284                                            LCK_EX, &flags, ldlm_blocking_ast,
01285                                            ldlm_completion_ast, NULL, NULL, 0,
01286                                            LVB_T_NONE,
01287                                            &info->mti_exp->exp_handle.h_cookie,
01288                                            lh);
01289                 RETURN(rc);
01290         }
01291         RETURN(rc);
01292 }
01293 
01294 static void mdt_rename_unlock(struct lustre_handle *lh)
01295 {
01296         ENTRY;
01297         LASSERT(lustre_handle_is_used(lh));
01298         /* Cancel the single rename lock right away */
01299         ldlm_lock_decref_and_cancel(lh, LCK_EX);
01300         EXIT;
01301 }
01302 
01303 /*
01304  * This is is_subdir() variant, it is CMD if cmm forwards it to correct
01305  * target. Source should not be ancestor of target dir. May be other rename
01306  * checks can be moved here later.
01307  */
01308 static int mdt_is_subdir(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01309                          struct mdt_object *dir,
01310                          const struct lu_fid *fid)
01311 {
01312         struct lu_fid dir_fid = dir->mot_header.loh_fid;
01313         int rc = 0;
01314         ENTRY;
01315 
01316         /* If the source and target are in the same directory, they can not
01317          * be parent/child relationship, so subdir check is not needed */
01318         if (lu_fid_eq(&dir_fid, fid))
01319                 return 0;
01320 
01321         if (!mdt_object_exists(dir))
01322                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
01323 
01324         rc = mdo_is_subdir(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(dir),
01325                            fid, &dir_fid);
01326         if (rc < 0) {
01327                 CERROR("%s: failed subdir check in "DFID" for "DFID
01328                        ": rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01329                        PFID(&dir_fid), PFID(fid), rc);
01330                 /* Return EINVAL only if a parent is the @fid */
01331                 if (rc == -EINVAL)
01332                         rc = -EIO;
01333         } else {
01334                 /* check the found fid */
01335                 if (lu_fid_eq(&dir_fid, fid))
01336                         rc = -EINVAL;
01337         }
01338 
01339         RETURN(rc);
01340 }
01341 
01342 /* Update object linkEA */
01343 struct mdt_lock_list {
01344         struct mdt_object       *mll_obj;
01345         struct mdt_lock_handle  mll_lh;
01346         struct list_head        mll_list;
01347 };
01348 
01349 static void mdt_unlock_list(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01350                             struct list_head *list, int rc)
01351 {
01352         struct mdt_lock_list *mll;
01353         struct mdt_lock_list *mll2;
01354 
01355         list_for_each_entry_safe(mll, mll2, list, mll_list) {
01356                 mdt_object_unlock_put(info, mll->mll_obj, &mll->mll_lh, rc);
01357                 list_del(&mll->mll_list);
01358                 OBD_FREE_PTR(mll);
01359         }
01360 }
01361 
01362 static int mdt_lock_objects_in_linkea(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01363                                       struct mdt_object *obj,
01364                                       struct mdt_object *pobj,
01365                                       struct list_head *lock_list)
01366 {
01367         struct lu_buf           *buf = &info->mti_big_buf;
01368         struct linkea_data      ldata = { NULL };
01369         int                     count;
01370         int                     retry_count;
01371         int                     rc;
01372         ENTRY;
01373 
01374         if (S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&obj->mot_obj)))
01375                 RETURN(0);
01376 
01377         buf = lu_buf_check_and_alloc(buf, PATH_MAX);
01378         if (buf->lb_buf == NULL)
01379                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01380 
01381         ldata.ld_buf = buf;
01382         rc = mdt_links_read(info, obj, &ldata);
01383         if (rc != 0) {
01384                 if (rc == -ENOENT || rc == -ENODATA)
01385                         rc = 0;
01386                 RETURN(rc);
01387         }
01388 
01389         /* ignore the migrating parent(@pobj) */
01390         retry_count = ldata.ld_leh->leh_reccount - 1;
01391 
01392 again:
01393         LASSERT(ldata.ld_leh != NULL);
01394         ldata.ld_lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)(ldata.ld_leh + 1);
01395         for (count = 0; count < ldata.ld_leh->leh_reccount; count++) {
01396                 struct mdt_device *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
01397                 struct mdt_object *mdt_pobj;
01398                 struct mdt_lock_list *mll;
01399                 struct lu_name name;
01400                 struct lu_fid  fid;
01401 
01402                 linkea_entry_unpack(ldata.ld_lee, &ldata.ld_reclen,
01403                                     &name, &fid);
01404                 mdt_pobj = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, mdt, &fid);
01405                 if (IS_ERR(mdt_pobj)) {
01406                         CWARN("%s: cannot find obj "DFID": rc = %ld\n",
01407                               mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(&fid), PTR_ERR(mdt_pobj));
01408                         goto next;
01409                 }
01410 
01411                 if (!mdt_object_exists(mdt_pobj)) {
01412                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: obj "DFID" does not exist\n",
01413                               mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(&fid));
01414                         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mdt_pobj);
01415                         goto next;
01416                 }
01417 
01418                 /* Check if the object already exists in the list */
01419                 list_for_each_entry(mll, lock_list, mll_list) {
01420                         if (mll->mll_obj == mdt_pobj) {
01421                                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mdt_pobj);
01422                                 goto next;
01423                         }
01424                 }
01425 
01426                 if (mdt_pobj == pobj) {
01427                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: skipping parent obj "DFID"\n",
01428                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(&fid));
01429                         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mdt_pobj);
01430                         goto next;
01431                 }
01432 
01433                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(mll);
01434                 if (mll == NULL) {
01435                         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mdt_pobj);
01436                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01437                 }
01438 
01439                 /* Since this needs to lock all of objects in linkea, to avoid
01440                  * deadlocks, because it does not follow parent-child order as
01441                  * other MDT operation, let's use try_lock here and if the lock
01442                  * cannot be gotten because of conflicting locks, then drop all
01443                  * current locks, send an AST to the client, and start again. */
01444                 mdt_lock_pdo_init(&mll->mll_lh, LCK_PW, &name);
01445                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock_try(info, mdt_pobj, &mll->mll_lh,
01446                                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, true);
01447                 if (rc == 0) {
01448                         mdt_unlock_list(info, lock_list, rc);
01449 
01450                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: busy lock on "DFID" %s retry %d\n",
01451                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(&fid), name.ln_name,
01452                                retry_count);
01453 
01454                         if (retry_count == 0) {
01455                                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mdt_pobj);
01456                                 OBD_FREE_PTR(mll);
01457                                 GOTO(out, rc = -EBUSY);
01458                         }
01459 
01460                         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, mdt_pobj, &mll->mll_lh,
01461                                              MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
01462                         if (rc != 0) {
01463                                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mdt_pobj);
01464                                 OBD_FREE_PTR(mll);
01465                                 GOTO(out, rc);
01466                         }
01467 
01468                         if (mdt_object_remote(mdt_pobj)) {
01469                                 struct ldlm_lock *lock;
01470 
01471                                 /* For remote object, Set lock to cb_atomic,
01472                                  * so lock can be released in blocking_ast()
01473                                  * immediately, then the next try_lock will
01474                                  * have better chance to succeds */
01475                                 lock =
01476                                 ldlm_handle2lock(&mll->mll_lh.mlh_rreg_lh);
01477                                 LASSERT(lock != NULL);
01478                                 lock_res_and_lock(lock);
01479                                 ldlm_set_atomic_cb(lock);
01480                                 unlock_res_and_lock(lock);
01481                                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
01482                         }
01483                         mdt_object_unlock_put(info, mdt_pobj, &mll->mll_lh, rc);
01484                         OBD_FREE_PTR(mll);
01485                         retry_count--;
01486                         goto again;
01487                 }
01488                 rc = 0;
01489                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mll->mll_list);
01490                 mll->mll_obj = mdt_pobj;
01491                 list_add_tail(&mll->mll_list, lock_list);
01492 next:
01493                 ldata.ld_lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)((char *)ldata.ld_lee +
01494                                                          ldata.ld_reclen);
01495         }
01496 out:
01497         if (rc != 0)
01498                 mdt_unlock_list(info, lock_list, rc);
01499         RETURN(rc);
01500 }
01501 
01502 /* migrate files from one MDT to another MDT */
01503 static int mdt_reint_migrate_internal(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01504                                       struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
01505 {
01506         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01507         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01508         struct mdt_object       *msrcdir;
01509         struct mdt_object       *mold;
01510         struct mdt_object       *mnew = NULL;
01511         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh_dirp;
01512         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh_childp;
01513         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh_tgtp = NULL;
01514         struct lu_fid           *old_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01515         struct list_head        lock_list;
01516         __u64                   lock_ibits;
01517         struct ldlm_lock        *lease = NULL;
01518         bool                    lock_open_sem = false;
01519         int                     rc;
01520         ENTRY;
01521 
01522         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "migrate "DFID"/"DNAME" to "DFID"\n", PFID(rr->rr_fid1),
01523                PNAME(&rr->rr_name), PFID(rr->rr_fid2));
01524 
01525         /* 1: lock the source dir. */
01526         msrcdir = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
01527         if (IS_ERR(msrcdir)) {
01528                 CERROR("%s: cannot find source dir "DFID" : rc = %d\n",
01529                         mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(rr->rr_fid1),
01530                         (int)PTR_ERR(msrcdir));
01531                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(msrcdir));
01532         }
01533 
01534         lh_dirp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
01535         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lh_dirp, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_name);
01536         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, msrcdir, lh_dirp, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
01537                                    true);
01538         if (rc)
01539                 GOTO(out_put_parent, rc);
01540 
01541         if (!mdt_object_remote(msrcdir)) {
01542                 rc = mdt_version_get_check_save(info, msrcdir, 0);
01543                 if (rc)
01544                         GOTO(out_unlock_parent, rc);
01545         }
01546 
01547         /* 2: sanity check and find the object to be migrated. */
01548         fid_zero(old_fid);
01549         rc = mdt_lookup_version_check(info, msrcdir, &rr->rr_name, old_fid, 2);
01550         if (rc != 0)
01551                 GOTO(out_unlock_parent, rc);
01552 
01553         if (lu_fid_eq(old_fid, rr->rr_fid1) || lu_fid_eq(old_fid, rr->rr_fid2))
01554                 GOTO(out_unlock_parent, rc = -EINVAL);
01555 
01556         if (!fid_is_md_operative(old_fid))
01557                 GOTO(out_unlock_parent, rc = -EPERM);
01558 
01559         if (lu_fid_eq(old_fid, &info->mti_mdt->mdt_md_root_fid))
01560                 GOTO(out_unlock_parent, rc = -EPERM);
01561 
01562         mold = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, old_fid);
01563         if (IS_ERR(mold))
01564                 GOTO(out_unlock_parent, rc = PTR_ERR(mold));
01565 
01566         if (mdt_object_remote(mold)) {
01567                 CERROR("%s: source "DFID" is on the remote MDT\n",
01568                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(old_fid));
01569                 GOTO(out_put_child, rc = -EREMOTE);
01570         }
01571 
01572         if (S_ISREG(lu_object_attr(&mold->mot_obj)) &&
01573             !mdt_object_remote(msrcdir)) {
01574                 CERROR("%s: parent "DFID" is still on the same"
01575                        " MDT, which should be migrated first:"
01576                        " rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01577                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(msrcdir)), -EPERM);
01578                 GOTO(out_put_child, rc = -EPERM);
01579         }
01580 
01581         rc = mdt_remote_permission(info);
01582         if (rc != 0)
01583                 GOTO(out_put_child, rc);
01584 
01585         /* 3: iterate the linkea of the object and lock all of the objects */
01586         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lock_list);
01587         rc = mdt_lock_objects_in_linkea(info, mold, msrcdir, &lock_list);
01588         if (rc != 0)
01589                 GOTO(out_put_child, rc);
01590 
01591         if (info->mti_spec.sp_migrate_close) {
01592                 struct close_data *data;
01593                 struct mdt_body  *repbody;
01594                 bool lease_broken = false;
01595 
01596                 if (!req_capsule_field_present(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_EPOCH,
01597                                       RCL_CLIENT) ||
01598                     !req_capsule_field_present(info->mti_pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA,
01599                                       RCL_CLIENT))
01600                         GOTO(out_lease, rc = -EPROTO);
01601 
01602                 data = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA);
01603                 if (data == NULL)
01604                         GOTO(out_lease, rc = -EPROTO);
01605 
01606                 lease = ldlm_handle2lock(&data->cd_handle);
01607                 if (lease == NULL)
01608                         GOTO(out_lease, rc = -ESTALE);
01609 
01610                 /* try to hold open_sem so that nobody else can open the file */
01611                 if (!down_write_trylock(&mold->mot_open_sem)) {
01612                         ldlm_lock_cancel(lease);
01613                         GOTO(out_lease, rc = -EBUSY);
01614                 }
01615 
01616                 lock_open_sem = true;
01617                 /* Check if the lease open lease has already canceled */
01618                 lock_res_and_lock(lease);
01619                 lease_broken = ldlm_is_cancel(lease);
01620                 unlock_res_and_lock(lease);
01621 
01622                 LDLM_DEBUG(lease, DFID " lease broken? %d",
01623                            PFID(mdt_object_fid(mold)), lease_broken);
01624 
01625                 /* Cancel server side lease. Client side counterpart should
01626                  * have been cancelled. It's okay to cancel it now as we've
01627                  * held mot_open_sem. */
01628                 ldlm_lock_cancel(lease);
01629 
01630                 if (lease_broken)
01631                         GOTO(out_lease, rc = -EAGAIN);
01632 out_lease:
01633                 rc = mdt_close_internal(info, mdt_info_req(info), NULL);
01634                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01635                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_CLOSE_INTENT_EXECED;
01636                 if (rc != 0)
01637                         GOTO(out_unlock_list, rc);
01638         }
01639 
01640         /* 4: lock of the object migrated object */
01641         lh_childp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_OLD];
01642         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh_childp, LCK_EX);
01643         lock_ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE |
01644                      MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT;
01645         if (mdt_object_remote(msrcdir)) {
01646                 /* Enqueue lookup lock from the parent MDT */
01647                 rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, msrcdir, mdt_object_fid(mold),
01648                                             &lh_childp->mlh_rreg_lh,
01649                                             lh_childp->mlh_rreg_mode,
01650                                             MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP, false);
01651                 if (rc != ELDLM_OK)
01652                         GOTO(out_unlock_list, rc);
01653 
01654                 lock_ibits &= ~MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
01655         }
01656 
01657         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mold, lh_childp, lock_ibits, true);
01658         if (rc != 0)
01659                 GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc);
01660 
01661         /* Migration is incompatible with HSM. */
01662         ma->ma_need = MA_HSM;
01663         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01664         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, mold, ma);
01665         if (rc != 0)
01666                 GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc);
01667 
01668         if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_HSM) && ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags != 0) {
01669                 rc = -ENOSYS;
01670                 CERROR("%s: cannot migrate HSM archived file "DFID": rc = %d\n",
01671                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(old_fid), rc);
01672                 GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc);
01673         }
01674 
01675         ma->ma_need = MA_LMV;
01676         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01677         ma->ma_lmv = (union lmv_mds_md *)info->mti_xattr_buf;
01678         ma->ma_lmv_size = sizeof(info->mti_xattr_buf);
01679         rc = mdt_stripe_get(info, mold, ma, XATTR_NAME_LMV);
01680         if (rc != 0)
01681                 GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc);
01682 
01683         if ((ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV)) {
01684                 struct lmv_mds_md_v1 *lmm1;
01685 
01686                 lmv_le_to_cpu(ma->ma_lmv, ma->ma_lmv);
01687                 lmm1 = &ma->ma_lmv->lmv_md_v1;
01688                 if (!(lmm1->lmv_hash_type & LMV_HASH_FLAG_MIGRATION)) {
01689                         CERROR("%s: can not migrate striped dir "DFID
01690                                ": rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01691                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(mold)), -EPERM);
01692                         GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc = -EPERM);
01693                 }
01694 
01695                 if (!fid_is_sane(&lmm1->lmv_stripe_fids[1]))
01696                         GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc = -EINVAL);
01697 
01698                 mnew = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt,
01699                                        &lmm1->lmv_stripe_fids[1]);
01700                 if (IS_ERR(mnew))
01701                         GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc = PTR_ERR(mnew));
01702 
01703                 if (!mdt_object_remote(mnew)) {
01704                         CERROR("%s: "DFID" being migrated is on this MDT:"
01705                                " rc  = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01706                                PFID(rr->rr_fid2), -EPERM);
01707                         GOTO(out_put_new, rc = -EPERM);
01708                 }
01709 
01710                 lh_tgtp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
01711                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lh_tgtp, LCK_EX);
01712                 rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, mnew,
01713                                             mdt_object_fid(mnew),
01714                                             &lh_tgtp->mlh_rreg_lh,
01715                                             lh_tgtp->mlh_rreg_mode,
01716                                             MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, false);
01717                 if (rc != 0) {
01718                         lh_tgtp = NULL;
01719                         GOTO(out_put_new, rc);
01720                 }
01721         } else {
01722                 mnew = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt,
01723                                        rr->rr_fid2);
01724                 if (IS_ERR(mnew))
01725                         GOTO(out_unlock_child, rc = PTR_ERR(mnew));
01726                 if (!mdt_object_remote(mnew)) {
01727                         CERROR("%s: Migration "DFID" is on this MDT:"
01728                                " rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01729                                PFID(rr->rr_fid2), -EXDEV);
01730                         GOTO(out_put_new, rc = -EXDEV);
01731                 }
01732         }
01733 
01734         /* 5: migrate it */
01735         mdt_reint_init_ma(info, ma);
01736 
01737         mdt_fail_write(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
01738                        OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_RENAME_WRITE);
01739 
01740         rc = mdo_migrate(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(msrcdir),
01741                          mdt_object_child(mold), &rr->rr_name,
01742                          mdt_object_child(mnew), ma);
01743         if (rc != 0)
01744                 GOTO(out_unlock_new, rc);
01745 
01746 out_unlock_new:
01747         if (lh_tgtp != NULL)
01748                 mdt_object_unlock(info, mnew, lh_tgtp, rc);
01749 out_put_new:
01750         if (mnew)
01751                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mnew);
01752 out_unlock_child:
01753         mdt_object_unlock(info, mold, lh_childp, rc);
01754 out_unlock_list:
01755         /* we don't really modify linkea objects, so we can safely decref these
01756          * locks, and this can avoid saving them as COS locks, which may prevent
01757          * subsequent migrate. */
01758         mdt_unlock_list(info, &lock_list, 1);
01759         if (lease != NULL) {
01760                 ldlm_reprocess_all(lease->l_resource);
01761                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lease);
01762         }
01763 
01764         if (lock_open_sem)
01765                 up_write(&mold->mot_open_sem);
01766 out_put_child:
01767         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mold);
01768 out_unlock_parent:
01769         mdt_object_unlock(info, msrcdir, lh_dirp, rc);
01770 out_put_parent:
01771         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, msrcdir);
01772 
01773         RETURN(rc);
01774 }
01775 
01776 static struct mdt_object *mdt_object_find_check(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01777                                                 const struct lu_fid *fid,
01778                                                 int idx)
01779 {
01780         struct mdt_object *dir;
01781         int rc;
01782         ENTRY;
01783 
01784         dir = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, fid);
01785         if (IS_ERR(dir))
01786                 RETURN(dir);
01787 
01788         /* check early, the real version will be saved after locking */
01789         rc = mdt_version_get_check(info, dir, idx);
01790         if (rc)
01791                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01792 
01793         RETURN(dir);
01794 out_put:
01795         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, dir);
01796         return ERR_PTR(rc);
01797 }
01798 
01799 static int mdt_object_lock_save(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01800                                 struct mdt_object *dir,
01801                                 struct mdt_lock_handle *lh,
01802                                 int idx, bool cos_incompat)
01803 {
01804         int rc;
01805 
01806         /* we lock the target dir if it is local */
01807         rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, dir, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
01808                                    cos_incompat);
01809         if (rc != 0)
01810                 return rc;
01811 
01812         /* get and save correct version after locking */
01813         mdt_version_get_save(info, dir, idx);
01814         return 0;
01815 }
01816 
01817 /*
01818  * VBR: rename versions in reply: 0 - srcdir parent; 1 - tgtdir parent;
01819  * 2 - srcdir child; 3 - tgtdir child.
01820  * Update on disk version of srcdir child.
01821  */
01833 static int mdt_reint_rename_internal(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01834                                      struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
01835 {
01836         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01837         struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01838         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
01839         struct mdt_object *msrcdir = NULL;
01840         struct mdt_object *mtgtdir = NULL;
01841         struct mdt_object *mold;
01842         struct mdt_object *mnew = NULL;
01843         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh_srcdirp;
01844         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh_tgtdirp;
01845         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh_oldp = NULL;
01846         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh_newp = NULL;
01847         struct lu_fid *old_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01848         struct lu_fid *new_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid2;
01849         __u64 lock_ibits;
01850         bool reverse = false;
01851         bool cos_incompat;
01852         int rc;
01853         ENTRY;
01854 
01855         DEBUG_REQ(D_INODE, req, "rename "DFID"/"DNAME" to "DFID"/"DNAME,
01856                   PFID(rr->rr_fid1), PNAME(&rr->rr_name),
01857                   PFID(rr->rr_fid2), PNAME(&rr->rr_tgt_name));
01858 
01859         /* find both parents. */
01860         msrcdir = mdt_object_find_check(info, rr->rr_fid1, 0);
01861         if (IS_ERR(msrcdir))
01862                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(msrcdir));
01863 
01864         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME3, 5);
01865 
01866         if (lu_fid_eq(rr->rr_fid1, rr->rr_fid2)) {
01867                 mtgtdir = msrcdir;
01868                 mdt_object_get(info->mti_env, mtgtdir);
01869         } else {
01870                 /* Check if the @msrcdir is not a child of the @mtgtdir,
01871                  * otherwise a reverse locking must take place. */
01872                 rc = mdt_is_subdir(info, msrcdir, rr->rr_fid2);
01873                 if (rc == -EINVAL)
01874                         reverse = true;
01875                 else if (rc)
01876                         GOTO(out_put_srcdir, rc);
01877 
01878                 mtgtdir = mdt_object_find_check(info, rr->rr_fid2, 1);
01879                 if (IS_ERR(mtgtdir))
01880                         GOTO(out_put_srcdir, rc = PTR_ERR(mtgtdir));
01881         }
01882 
01883         /* source needs to be looked up after locking source parent, otherwise
01884          * this rename may race with unlink source, and cause rename hang, see
01885          * sanityn.sh 55b, so check parents first, if later we found source is
01886          * remote, relock parents. */
01887         cos_incompat = (mdt_object_remote(msrcdir) ||
01888                         mdt_object_remote(mtgtdir));
01889 
01890         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME4, 5);
01891 
01892         /* lock parents in the proper order. */
01893         lh_srcdirp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
01894         lh_tgtdirp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
01895 
01896 relock:
01897         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lh_srcdirp, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_name);
01898         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lh_tgtdirp, LCK_PW, &rr->rr_tgt_name);
01899 
01900         if (reverse) {
01901                 rc = mdt_object_lock_save(info, mtgtdir, lh_tgtdirp, 1,
01902                                           cos_incompat);
01903                 if (rc)
01904                         GOTO(out_put_tgtdir, rc);
01905 
01906                 OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME, 5);
01907 
01908                 rc = mdt_object_lock_save(info, msrcdir, lh_srcdirp, 0,
01909                                           cos_incompat);
01910                 if (rc != 0) {
01911                         mdt_object_unlock(info, mtgtdir, lh_tgtdirp, rc);
01912                         GOTO(out_put_tgtdir, rc);
01913                 }
01914         } else {
01915                 rc = mdt_object_lock_save(info, msrcdir, lh_srcdirp, 0,
01916                                           cos_incompat);
01917                 if (rc)
01918                         GOTO(out_put_tgtdir, rc);
01919 
01920                 OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME, 5);
01921 
01922                 if (mtgtdir != msrcdir) {
01923                         rc = mdt_object_lock_save(info, mtgtdir, lh_tgtdirp, 1,
01924                                                   cos_incompat);
01925                 } else if (lh_srcdirp->mlh_pdo_hash !=
01926                            lh_tgtdirp->mlh_pdo_hash) {
01927                         rc = mdt_pdir_hash_lock(info, lh_tgtdirp, mtgtdir,
01928                                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
01929                                                 cos_incompat);
