01930                         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_PDO_LOCK2, 10);
01931                 }
01932                 if (rc != 0) {
01933                         mdt_object_unlock(info, msrcdir, lh_srcdirp, rc);
01934                         GOTO(out_put_tgtdir, rc);
01935                 }
01936         }
01937 
01938         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME4, 5);
01939         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_RENAME2, 5);
01940 
01941         /* find mold object. */
01942         fid_zero(old_fid);
01943         rc = mdt_lookup_version_check(info, msrcdir, &rr->rr_name, old_fid, 2);
01944         if (rc != 0)
01945                 GOTO(out_unlock_parents, rc);
01946 
01947         if (lu_fid_eq(old_fid, rr->rr_fid1) || lu_fid_eq(old_fid, rr->rr_fid2))
01948                 GOTO(out_unlock_parents, rc = -EINVAL);
01949 
01950         if (!fid_is_md_operative(old_fid))
01951                 GOTO(out_unlock_parents, rc = -EPERM);
01952 
01953         mold = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, old_fid);
01954         if (IS_ERR(mold))
01955                 GOTO(out_unlock_parents, rc = PTR_ERR(mold));
01956 
01957         /* Check if @mtgtdir is subdir of @mold, before locking child
01958          * to avoid reverse locking. */
01959         if (mtgtdir != msrcdir) {
01960                 rc = mdt_is_subdir(info, mtgtdir, old_fid);
01961                 if (rc)
01962                         GOTO(out_put_old, rc);
01963         }
01964 
01965         tgt_vbr_obj_set(info->mti_env, mdt_obj2dt(mold));
01966         /* save version after locking */
01967         mdt_version_get_save(info, mold, 2);
01968 
01969         if (!cos_incompat && mdt_object_remote(mold)) {
01970                 cos_incompat = true;
01971                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mold);
01972                 mdt_object_unlock(info, mtgtdir, lh_tgtdirp, -EAGAIN);
01973                 mdt_object_unlock(info, msrcdir, lh_srcdirp, -EAGAIN);
01974                 goto relock;
01975         }
01976 
01977         /* find mnew object:
01978          * mnew target object may not exist now
01979          * lookup with version checking */
01980         fid_zero(new_fid);
01981         rc = mdt_lookup_version_check(info, mtgtdir, &rr->rr_tgt_name, new_fid,
01982                                       3);
01983         if (rc == 0) {
01984                 /* the new_fid should have been filled at this moment */
01985                 if (lu_fid_eq(old_fid, new_fid))
01986                         GOTO(out_put_old, rc);
01987 
01988                 if (lu_fid_eq(new_fid, rr->rr_fid1) ||
01989                     lu_fid_eq(new_fid, rr->rr_fid2))
01990                         GOTO(out_put_old, rc = -EINVAL);
01991 
01992                 if (!fid_is_md_operative(new_fid))
01993                         GOTO(out_put_old, rc = -EPERM);
01994 
01995                 mnew = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, new_fid);
01996                 if (IS_ERR(mnew))
01997                         GOTO(out_put_old, rc = PTR_ERR(mnew));
01998 
01999                 if (mdt_object_remote(mnew)) {
02000                         struct mdt_body  *repbody;
02001 
02002                         /* Always send rename req to the target child MDT */
02003                         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill,
02004                                                          &RMF_MDT_BODY);
02005                         LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
02006                         repbody->mbo_fid1 = *new_fid;
02007                         repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_MDS);
02008                         GOTO(out_put_new, rc = -EXDEV);
02009                 }
02010                 /* Before locking the target dir, check we do not replace
02011                  * a dir with a non-dir, otherwise it may deadlock with
02012                  * link op which tries to create a link in this dir
02013                  * back to this non-dir. */
02014                 if (S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&mnew->mot_obj)) &&
02015                     !S_ISDIR(lu_object_attr(&mold->mot_obj)))
02016                         GOTO(out_put_new, rc = -EISDIR);
02017 
02018                 lh_oldp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_OLD];
02019                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lh_oldp, LCK_EX);
02020                 lock_ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR;
02021                 if (mdt_object_remote(msrcdir)) {
02022                         /* Enqueue lookup lock from the parent MDT */
02023                         rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, msrcdir,
02024                                                     mdt_object_fid(mold),
02025                                                     &lh_oldp->mlh_rreg_lh,
02026                                                     lh_oldp->mlh_rreg_mode,
02027                                                     MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP,
02028                                                     false);
02029                         if (rc != ELDLM_OK)
02030                                 GOTO(out_put_new, rc);
02031 
02032                         lock_ibits &= ~MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
02033                 }
02034 
02035                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mold, lh_oldp, lock_ibits,
02036                                            cos_incompat);
02037                 if (rc != 0)
02038                         GOTO(out_unlock_old, rc);
02039 
02040                 /* Check if @msrcdir is subdir of @mnew, before locking child
02041                  * to avoid reverse locking. */
02042                 if (mtgtdir != msrcdir) {
02043                         rc = mdt_is_subdir(info, msrcdir, new_fid);
02044                         if (rc)
02045                                 GOTO(out_unlock_old, rc);
02046                 }
02047 
02048                 /* We used to acquire MDS_INODELOCK_FULL here but we
02049                  * can't do this now because a running HSM restore on
02050                  * the rename onto victim will hold the layout
02051                  * lock. See LU-4002. */
02052 
02053                 lh_newp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_NEW];
02054                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lh_newp, LCK_EX);
02055                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mnew, lh_newp,
02056                                            MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP |
02057                                            MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE,
02058                                            cos_incompat);
02059                 if (rc != 0)
02060                         GOTO(out_unlock_old, rc);
02061 
02062                 /* get and save version after locking */
02063                 mdt_version_get_save(info, mnew, 3);
02064         } else if (rc != -EREMOTE && rc != -ENOENT) {
02065                 GOTO(out_put_old, rc);
02066         } else {
02067                 lh_oldp = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_OLD];
02068                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lh_oldp, LCK_EX);
02069                 lock_ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR;
02070                 if (mdt_object_remote(msrcdir)) {
02071                         /* Enqueue lookup lock from the parent MDT */
02072                         rc = mdt_remote_object_lock(info, msrcdir,
02073                                                     mdt_object_fid(mold),
02074                                                     &lh_oldp->mlh_rreg_lh,
02075                                                     lh_oldp->mlh_rreg_mode,
02076                                                     MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP,
02077                                                     false);
02078                         if (rc != ELDLM_OK)
02079                                 GOTO(out_put_old, rc);
02080 
02081                         lock_ibits &= ~MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
02082                 }
02083 
02084                 rc = mdt_reint_object_lock(info, mold, lh_oldp, lock_ibits,
02085                                            cos_incompat);
02086                 if (rc != 0)
02087                         GOTO(out_unlock_old, rc);
02088 
02089                 mdt_enoent_version_save(info, 3);
02090         }
02091 
02092         /* step 5: rename it */
02093         mdt_reint_init_ma(info, ma);
02094 
02095         mdt_fail_write(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt->mdt_bottom,
02096                        OBD_FAIL_MDS_REINT_RENAME_WRITE);
02097 
02098         if (mnew != NULL)
02099                 mutex_lock(&mnew->mot_lov_mutex);
02100 
02101         rc = mdo_rename(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(msrcdir),
02102                         mdt_object_child(mtgtdir), old_fid, &rr->rr_name,
02103                         mnew != NULL ? mdt_object_child(mnew) : NULL,
02104                         &rr->rr_tgt_name, ma);
02105 
02106         if (mnew != NULL)
02107                 mutex_unlock(&mnew->mot_lov_mutex);
02108 
02109         /* handle last link of tgt object */
02110         if (rc == 0) {
02111                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_RENAME);
02112                 if (mnew)
02113                         mdt_handle_last_unlink(info, mnew, ma);
02114 
02115                 mdt_rename_counter_tally(info, info->mti_mdt, req,
02116                                          msrcdir, mtgtdir);
02117         }
02118 
02119         EXIT;
02120         if (mnew != NULL)
02121                 mdt_object_unlock(info, mnew, lh_newp, rc);
02122 out_unlock_old:
02123         mdt_object_unlock(info, mold, lh_oldp, rc);
02124 out_put_new:
02125         if (mnew != NULL)
02126                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mnew);
02127 out_put_old:
02128         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mold);
02129 out_unlock_parents:
02130         mdt_object_unlock(info, mtgtdir, lh_tgtdirp, rc);
02131         mdt_object_unlock(info, msrcdir, lh_srcdirp, rc);
02132 out_put_tgtdir:
02133         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, mtgtdir);
02134 out_put_srcdir:
02135         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, msrcdir);
02136         return rc;
02137 }
02138 
02139 static int mdt_reint_rename_or_migrate(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02140                                        struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc, bool rename)
02141 {
02142         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
02143         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
02144         struct lustre_handle    rename_lh = { 0 };
02145         int                     rc;
02146         ENTRY;
02147 
02148         if (info->mti_dlm_req)
02149                 ldlm_request_cancel(req, info->mti_dlm_req, 0, LATF_SKIP);
02150 
02151         if (!fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid1) ||
02152             !fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid2))
02153                 RETURN(-EPERM);
02154 
02155         /* Note: do not enqueue rename lock for replay request, because
02156          * if other MDT holds rename lock, but being blocked to wait for
02157          * this MDT to finish its recovery, and the failover MDT can not
02158          * get rename lock, which will cause deadlock. */
02159         if (!req_is_replay(req)) {
02160                 rc = mdt_rename_lock(info, &rename_lh);
02161                 if (rc != 0) {
02162                         CERROR("%s: can't lock FS for rename: rc  = %d\n",
02163                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), rc);
02164                         RETURN(rc);
02165                 }
02166         }
02167 
02168         if (rename)
02169                 rc = mdt_reint_rename_internal(info, lhc);
02170         else
02171                 rc = mdt_reint_migrate_internal(info, lhc);
02172 
02173         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&rename_lh))
02174                 mdt_rename_unlock(&rename_lh);
02175 
02176         RETURN(rc);
02177 }
02178 
02179 static int mdt_reint_rename(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02180                             struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
02181 {
02182         return mdt_reint_rename_or_migrate(info, lhc, true);
02183 }
02184 
02185 static int mdt_reint_migrate(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02186                             struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
02187 {
02188         return mdt_reint_rename_or_migrate(info, lhc, false);
02189 }
02190 
02191 struct mdt_reinter {
02192         int (*mr_handler)(struct mdt_thread_info *, struct mdt_lock_handle *);
02193         enum lprocfs_extra_opc mr_extra_opc;
02194 };
02195 
02196 static const struct mdt_reinter mdt_reinters[] = {
02197         [REINT_SETATTR] = {
02198                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_setattr,
02199                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_SETATTR,
02200         },
02201         [REINT_CREATE] = {
02202                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_create,
02203                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_CREATE,
02204         },
02205         [REINT_LINK] = {
02206                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_link,
02207                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_LINK,
02208         },
02209         [REINT_UNLINK] = {
02210                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_unlink,
02211                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_UNLINK,
02212         },
02213         [REINT_RENAME] = {
02214                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_rename,
02215                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_RENAME,
02216         },
02217         [REINT_OPEN] = {
02218                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_open,
02219                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_OPEN,
02220         },
02221         [REINT_SETXATTR] = {
02222                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_setxattr,
02223                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_SETXATTR,
02224         },
02225         [REINT_RMENTRY] = {
02226                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_unlink,
02227                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_UNLINK,
02228         },
02229         [REINT_MIGRATE] = {
02230                 .mr_handler = &mdt_reint_migrate,
02231                 .mr_extra_opc = MDS_REINT_RENAME,
02232         },
02233 };
02234 
02235 int mdt_reint_rec(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
02236                   struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
02237 {
02238         const struct mdt_reinter *mr;
02239         int rc;
02240         ENTRY;
02241 
02242         if (!(info->mti_rr.rr_opcode < ARRAY_SIZE(mdt_reinters)))
02243                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
02244 
02245         mr = &mdt_reinters[info->mti_rr.rr_opcode];
02246         if (mr->mr_handler == NULL)
02247                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
02248 
02249         rc = (*mr->mr_handler)(info, lhc);
02250 
02251         lprocfs_counter_incr(ptlrpc_req2svc(mdt_info_req(info))->srv_stats,
02252                              PTLRPC_LAST_CNTR + mr->mr_extra_opc);
02253 
02254         RETURN(rc);
02255 }
